BibleStudyGui::UITextViewWidget

BibleStudyGui::UITextViewWidget Class Reference

This class respresents a text box that displays a collection of verses and allows the user to star, unstar a verse and navigate a translation. More...

#include <UITextViewWidget.h>

 Create a new instance of the UITextViewWidget class.

Detailed Description

This class respresents a text box that displays a collection of verses and allows the user to star, unstar a verse and navigate a translation.
